THE MARINER.name: THE MARINER
key_facts: His real name is Billy (or Will)
Rose is his sister
He wears fishing-themed combat gear including an oar weapon
He tracked Rose via AirTag
He believed his father was dead
His father actually abandoned the family
He romanticized his abusive childhood
He has a moral code he calls the Mariner's code

ROSE.name: ROSE
key_facts: She is Mariner's sister
She wears a Tim Hortons uniform
She stole $20 million in cryptocurrency from Salvatori's gang
Vinnie was her ex-boyfriend
She knows the truth about their father
She delivers the final speech redefining Mariner as a hero
The password is hidden on a chip in her purse lining

DAD.name: DAD
key_facts: He appears only in flashbacks
He is presented in two versions: idealized and dark/true
The idealized version shows warm teaching moments
The dark version reveals physical abuse and alcoholism
He abandoned the family and lives in Chimney Bay
Mariner believed he was dead
His 'hero' speech is self-aggrandizing in the dark version
He is a fisherman
